CSGO'dan daha iyi ancak Türk sunucuları çoğunlukla aktif olmuyor ve 2 - 3 Türk sunucusu var. Onların da kitle rezalet. Ruslar gene sarmışlar oyunu. Yani oyun iyi dediğim gibi CSGO'dan daha iyi ama keşke Türk sunucuları fazla olsa. Bu arada oyundaki silahlar vuruş hissiyatı ve çok sekmemesi oyunu kolay oynanılabilinir ve zevkli bir hale sokuyor. Öneririm. İndirimde 3Tl'ye mi ne düşüyor zaten.
对于我这种低配党来说很好玩了 就是服务器人数太少了
iT'S OKAY, TOO BAD IT'S FULL OF RUSSIANS, THEY PLAY LIKE BOTS.

I play this game when I have nothing better to do, or when I need a break from something. I've never played a map that isn't cs_crackhouse, and I suck at playing FPS games with actual people. I still find myself having so much fun playing this game anyways,

duck fiziği kötü olsa bile CS:GOdan daha fazla mekanik bulunmakta ama duck fiziği çok kötü ve duck fiziği kötü onun dışın da güzel oyun bir de duck fiziği kötü
muito parecido com o antigo e com o novo e pra mim fui um dos poucos que eu me divertir jogando

This game never gets old, to this day you are ablte to have fun with the various modalities like zombie escape, bhop, minigames, jail ecc... Sure there are not as many people as there were once but the playerbase still have consistent number and for what Counter Strike: Source provides i'll always pick it over Counter Strike: Global Offensive. 
P.S. This game is not meant to be taken seriously or with a competitive mind but with the mentality of playing the game to have fun (wich you may think its obvious that when you play the game you want to have fun but i didn't find any game released in the past nor to this day as fun as CSS)
